entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
